question: Study shows that many criminals have a low level education.For that reason, some people believe that the bast way to reduce crime is to educate people in prison, so that they can get a job when they leave prison. Do you agree or disagree?
text: One of the. Highly controversial issues today relates to education. The research illustrates that because of insufficient education, a lot of crime had occurred. For this matter, someone hopes that teachers teach subjects for the prisoner. After that, they are able to work in the company when they get out of jail. In my opinion, I agree with this statement.

There is no doubt that they can get accustomed to normal life. This means that they can suit immediately. If they are not able to take part in public, they tend to crimes again. However, while they stay in jail and connect to the common, they do not lose their social position after leaving. Additionally, they get certain skills such as programming in the prison, they can get a job as soon as possible after getting out. As for this, they are possible to earn money and their life will be sufficient. Also, their mental might be stable and they do not do wrong again.

Moreover, it is clear that they can solve the recent matter that is the luck of the teacher. This is because if they undergo to learn the subject in the prison, they consider the other people do not a crime anymore and they would like to tell their students why the studying is necessary for us.  Furthermore, they might respect  their teachers because they are supportive and redirect to a good way of their life. For example, according to a Japanese fiction movie, the ex-prisoner become a good coach because he had  experience learning in  jail with the teacher. Some people might do after leaving prison like this movie. As the result, they have the power to solve the latest problems.

To sum up, I agree  the education in the prison can let a good way to lessen the crime rate because they can fit common place easily, they  have  money themselves, and they return their experience to their learner.
